TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDeserializationCallback

summary.span: 指示在完成整个对象图形的反序列化时通知类。

span.span: Indicates that a class is to be notified when deserialization of the entire object graph has been completed.

summary.span: 注意当用 XmlSerializer (System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer) 反序列化时，不调用此接口。

span.span: Note that this interface is not called when deserializing with the XmlSerializer (System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer).

remarks.format: ## Examples [!code-cpp[IDeserializationCallback Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IDeserializationCallback Interface Example/CPP/ideserializationcallback.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IDeserializationCallback Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IDeserializationCallback Interface Example/CS/ideserializationcallback.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IDeserializationCallback Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IDeserializationCallback Interface Example/VB/ideserializationcallback.vb#1)]

span.para: 实现该接口当前作为支持的对象图反序列化完成时调用的方法的一部分。如果对象需要在子对象上执行代码，它可以延迟此操作，实现，并执行代码，仅当它此接口上调用返回。

Implement the current interface as part of support for a method that is called when deserialization of the object graph is complete. If an object needs to execute code on its child objects, it can delay this action, implement , and execute the code only when it is called back on this interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDeserialization(object sender) cil managed

param.name: sender

span.span: The object that initiated the callback.

param.span: 当前未实现该参数的功能。

span.span: The functionality for this parameter is not currently implemented.

summary.span: 在整个对象图形已经反序列化时运行。

span.span: Runs when the entire object graph has been deserialized.
